text: xallxh thrng pen phu sng lm thanghlay læw man di rwm taw kan khun pen mekh læw phraxngkh thrng hı man phæ kracay pi tam thxngfa thea thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa phraxngkh thrng thahı man penk lum kxn læw cea ca hen fn tklng ma cak thamklang man meux man di tklng mayang phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh cak pwng baw khxng phraxngkh meux nan phwk khea k dicı
